  • Classes in imagingbook.common.geometry.line used by imagingbook.common.geometry.fitting.line
    Class
    Description
    AlgebraicLine
    This class represents an algebraic line of the form A x + B y + C = 0.
  • Classes in imagingbook.common.geometry.line used by imagingbook.common.geometry.hulls

  • Classes in imagingbook.common.geometry.line used by imagingbook.common.geometry.line
    Class
    Description
    AlgebraicLine
    This class represents an algebraic line of the form A x + B y + C = 0.
    HessianLine
    This class represents a straight line in Hessian normal form, i.e., x * cos(angle) + y * sin(angle) = radius.
    ParametricLine
    This class represents a line in parametric form: x = s + t v, where s is a start point on the line, v is a direction vector, and t is a real variable.
    SlopeInterceptLine
    This class represents a line in slope-intercept form: y = k x + d.
  • Classes in imagingbook.common.geometry.line used by imagingbook.common.hough
    Class
    Description
    AlgebraicLine
    This class represents an algebraic line of the form A x + B y + C = 0.
    HessianLine
    This class represents a straight line in Hessian normal form, i.e., x * cos(angle) + y * sin(angle) = radius.
